Doesn't work. It says: U have 7 days to validate your serial number. Cracked "amtlib.dll" in previous release works just fine. I stick with it.

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Add to system32/drivers/etc/hosts file:
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com

2. Install CS6 with serial "1234 1234 1234 1234 1234 1234" & click "connect later"

3. Backup & Replace adobe_oobelib.dll at
C:Program Files (x86)Common FilesAdobeOOBEPDAppP6

4. When it validating the serial, click the "have trouble...", you will be redirected to activate offline

5. Copy the request code to Response code field to activate it

I had some trouble with the instructions. So I pieced this together from here and another torrent. It worked perfectly fo me:

Add to system32/drivers/etc/hosts file:
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com

1. Disconnect from the Internet
2. Install *using serial* 1325-1421-1213-1243-1808-1920
3. Reboot
4. Rename original and copy cracked 
adobe_oobelib.dll
in
C:Program Files (x86)Common Files/Adobe/OOBE/PDApp/P6
C:Program Files (x86)Common Files/Adobe/OOBE/PDApp/LWA
C:Program Files (x86)Adobe/Acrobat 10.0/Acrobat

5. Launch for ex. Photoshop (64-bit) go to Help>Activation>I'm having trouble connecting to the internet
(in the middle)>Offline Activation (right-bottom)>copy code provided by the application
(yes the one that's in the window) and paste it below (yup in that same window. Finish it!
6. Never create an Adobe account if asked
7. Connect to the Internet, check for updates ;)
